versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Identifies actionable tasks and follow-up items from content

schema.prompt:
Extract actionable tasks and follow-up items from content:

Content to Analyze: {{input.contentToAnalyze}}
Context Type: {{input.contextType}}
Task Preferences: {{input.taskPreferences}}

Identify and extract actionable items:

1. Explicit Tasks:
   - Direct action requests
   - Clearly stated to-dos
   - Assigned responsibilities
   - Scheduled activities
   - Required deliverables

2. Implicit Tasks:
   - Implied follow-ups
   - Necessary preparations
   - Prerequisite actions
   - Supporting activities
   - Coordination needs

3. Task Categories:
   - Administrative tasks
   - Communication tasks
   - Research/analysis
   - Creative work
   - Decision-making
   - Review/approval
   - Meeting preparation

4. Task Properties:
   - Priority level (1-5)
   - Estimated time
   - Due date/deadline
   - Dependencies
   - Required resources
   - Skill level needed
   - Delegatable status

5. Context Analysis:
   - Urgency indicators
   - Importance signals
   - Stakeholder involvement
   - Business impact
   - Risk factors

6. Task Formatting:
   - Action verb start
   - Clear description
   - Measurable outcome
   - Context preservation
   - Reference information

7. Follow-up Items:
   - Check-in points
   - Status updates
   - Review meetings
   - Progress reports
   - Feedback collection

8. Task Relationships:
   - Sequential dependencies
   - Parallel opportunities
   - Blocking factors
   - Collaboration needs
   - Resource conflicts

Return as structured JSON with keys: explicitTasks (array), implicitTasks (array), taskProperties (object per task), followUpItems (array), taskRelationships (object), priorityMatrix (object), timeEstimates (object), actionPlan (array).

props.placeholder: Enter the content to extract tasks from (emails, meeting notes, etc.)...
Email, meeting notes, project brief, etc.
Preferred task formats, detail level, etc.

translations.description: Identifies and extracts actionable tasks and follow-up items from various content types
translations.instructions: Enter content to analyze for tasks. The system will identify both explicit and implicit action items with context and priorities.
translations.name: Task Extractor
